embed: <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/o9pEzgHorH0&hl=en&fs=1"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/o9pEzgHorH0&hl=en&fs=1" allowscriptaccess="always" height="344" width="425" allowfullscreen="true" type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></embed></object>
summary:
Classes are great but they are also overused. This talk will describe examples
of class overuse taken from real world code and refactor the unnecessary
classes, exceptions, and modules out of them.
title: Stop Writing Classes
